trans-unit.source: Specifies the security settings for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir sikkerhetsinnstillingene for den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan arves.

trans-unit.source: This class specifies the kind of security to be applied to the `wsFederationHttpBinding` binding and the specific security settings.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvilken type sikkerhetsinformasjonen som skal brukes for denne klassen i `wsFederationHttpBinding` binding av bestemte innstillinger og sikkerhetsinnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the message security settings for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir meldingen sikkerhetsinnstillingene for den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpBinding"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object returned specifies detailed message-level security properties for the `wsFederationHttpBinding`.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som ble returnert angir detaljert melding sikkerhetsegenskaper for det `wsFederationHttpBinding`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FederatedMessageSecurityOverHttp"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of security to be applied.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvilken type sikkerhet som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The enumeration member returned specifies which general type of security is to be applied.
trans-unit.target: Medlemmet opplisting returnerte angir hvilken generell type sikkerhet skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The allowed values are <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.
trans-unit.target: Tillatte verdier er <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> security mode, the message is sent over HTTP and SOAP message security is used to protect the message.
trans-unit.target: I de <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>sikkerhetsmodus, meldingen sendes via HTTP og sikkerhet for SOAP-melding brukes til å beskytte meldingen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: Client authentication is performed based on the issued token obtained from the security token service.
trans-unit.target: Klientgodkjenning utføres basert på det utstedte tokenet hentet fra sikkerhetstokentjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Server authentication is based on the server's certificate.
trans-unit.target: Server-godkjenning er basert på serverens sertifikat.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode> security mode, the message is sent over HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: I de <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>sikkerhetsmodus, meldingen sendes via HTTPS.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: Client authentication is performed by including the issued token obtained from the security token service in the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: Klientgodkjenning utføres ved å inkludere utstedt token hentet fra sikkerhetstokentjenesten i SOAP-meldingen.

trans-unit.source: Server authentication, based on the server's certificate, is performed as part of the HTTPS connection setup.
trans-unit.target: Server-godkjenning, basert på serverens sertifikat utføres som en del av installasjonen for HTTPS-tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurityMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message*>egenskapen er endret fra standardverdien og skal serialiseres.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Message*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Mode*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Mode*>egenskapen er endret fra standardverdien og skal serialiseres.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Mode*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Mode*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Mode*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WSFederationHttpSecurity.Mode*>
